reviewText: if you want to know the Chinese culture then this is an excellent Blue ray to own.

China - namely Shanghai and Hong Kong are fast changing so this is an OLD movie that should be discontinued !
Furthermore i`m not a fan of Rudy Maxa - even if he has a wide review base - it`s not up to the task entirely

I traveled to Beijing and I would like to go back again.
It is good information where you like to go.
The quality of the video was good, but it was rather a glance of the China, only 50 minutes show.
Now showing the present of Chinese.  It is changing fast.  Consider a video of china history is ok for this disc.  Consider to put it in your collection.
good documentary for traveling in China
Liked it; showed different aspects of China main cities.  Would have liked it to include more about other areas.

This program covers two of China's major cities namely Shanghai and Hong Kong which are constantly evolving and whilst this type of program can easily become dated nevertheless it gives a good idea of what delights to expect when visiting these cities. DVD version of the blu-ray disc is included in the package
Not so sharp picture as I expected. Love anyway.
